item.title: 📣 Attention Social Media Content Creators! 📣 - Upwork
item.description:
We are a reputable dental assisting school with a strong commitment to excellence. We are seeking a dedicated and experienced freelancer to collaborate with us on enhancing our social media presence and driving more traffic to our school. We can provide the raw content to be edited into posts or short videos.

🎯 Responsibilities 🎯

As a Freelance Social Media Content Creator, you will be responsible for:

✨ Developing captivating and engaging content for our social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, etc.)
✨ Creating visually stunning graphics, images, and videos that showcase our school, facilities, and students
✨ Crafting compelling and informative captions that effectively convey our mission and values
✨ Collaborating with our marketing team to develop and execute social media campaigns
✨ Staying up-to-date with the latest social media trends, algorithms, and best practices
✨ Monitoring and analyzing social media metrics to optimize content strategy

🔑 Requirements 🔑

To excel in this role, you should possess:

✅ Proven experience as a social media content creator, preferably in the education or related field
✅ A strong portfolio showcasing your creativity and ability to engage audiences
✅ Proficiency in graphic design and video editing tools
✅ Excellent written and verbal communication skills
✅ In-depth knowledge of various social media platforms and their best practices
✅ Strong understanding of target audience segmentation and engagement strategies

Hourly Range: $8.00-$18.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 06:13 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, YouTube, Social Media Content, Content Writing, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Graphic Design
Skills: TikTok, YouTube, Social Media Content, Content Writing, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Ambitious Youtube Video Editor to Help Students Study Abroad - Upwork
item.description:
We are Global Admissions, on a mission to create the world's largest and best online platform for international students to study abroad.

We are seeking a highly motivated and ambitious video editor to create videos for our Youtube channel, Tiktok and Instagram (shorts) so we can help more students study abroad.

We manage the China Admissions and Global Admissions youtube channels. We have 23,000+ subscribers and we are looking to take our channels to 100k+ by producing the highest quality, most helpful content for students at scale.

Our mission is to make it easy for students to apply to universities abroad because we understand it has the power to change students' lives.

Responsibilities Include:
- Editing videos for Youtube - approximately 3-8 per week including shorts
   (we value quality over quantity)
- Thumbnails and creation
- Ideas for content, research, etc., would also be helpful to help us grow more

Requirements:
- Fast, concise and effective communication
- Excited to learn
- Fluency in English
- Alignment with our mission and company values: Caring, Learning, Excellence, Focus, and Speed

We are seeking a candidate who:
- Is ambitious and energetic with high standards
- Flexible thinking with an open mind
- It’s a big advantage if you have studied abroad
- Takes ownership of the role,
- Has new ideas on how things can be improved
- Commits to excellence
- Cares about students and fellow team members
- Is looking for a long term position

Why join us?
- Work with a top international team with some of the smartest people in the industry
- In our team we have successfully scaled a Youtube channel to 1 million subscribers+
- Flexible remote working arrangements
- International culture
- Travel opportunities
- Competitive pay with attractive incentives based on performance
- Long term role with huge opportunities as we expand

Process:
Please reply back with the code 182819, please:
1) Introduce yourself and why you are interested
2) Share some links to videos you have created before
3) Let us know what your future career plans are
4) Let us know your expected hourly rates
We will review and contact you and we plan to start with a brief paid test project with shortlisted candidates.

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 16, 2024 06:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Content Writing, Videography, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Content Writing, Videography, Graphic Design
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Real Estate Promotional Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to create a professional and engaging promotional video for our real estate business. The video should showcase our properties, highlight their unique features, and effectively communicate the benefits of investing in our real estate offerings. The video should be visually appealing, well-edited, and have a strong narrative flow. We will provide you with the necessary footage, images, and branding guidelines. However, you will be responsible for the creative direction, scriptwriting, voice-over, and final production.
  Relevant skills:
  - Videography
  - Video editing
  - Scriptwriting
  - Voice-over narration
  - Creative direction
  - Branding
  - Attention to detail

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 16, 2024 05:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: AI Fashion House Video Editor/Branding - Upwork
item.description:
We’re an AI powered fashion house and we are looking for a graphic designer/video editor to help us with branding and content creation.

We are looking for someone familiar with the fashion niche and aesthetics, who can interpret our scripts and styling to create an engaging and visually pleasing video.

This person should know about branding, graphic design and video editing. Please share your portfolio, as well as the programs you currently use to create. Let us know why you’d like to become part of the team, and we hope to talk soon!

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 05:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Health & Nutrition
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video

Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Health & Nutrition niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Health & Nutrition STORIES/FACTS

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/fx0kIEOL59Q?si=bO8SEpiHV6-F4-0V

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “strawberrylemonade”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 16, 2024 05:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 3d Animation using close up camera angles - Upwork
item.description:
Need a 20 second animation that shows the close up of a 3d logo similar to this video of the first 7-10 seconds https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d5xw7qeKpP8&t=13s.
I only want reveal of teaser of the logo but not reveal the whole thing.

I would like frame and camera angle to change to a different part of the logo every 5 seconds with a glitch/static affect when it changes to the next frame. I have an audio track already made up for this.

Quick turnaround under 48hours.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 16, 2024 05:17 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:3D Animation, 3D Design, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: 3D Animation, 3D Design, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Australia
click to apply
